datapack.title: PvP Arenas
datapack.description: Certain spaces on the server are designated as "Arenas" where pvp combat is encouraged and rewarded with Harmony.

datapack.title: Harmony
datapack.description: A scoreboard objective that accumulates when interacting with other players and decays while alone.

datapack.title: Charms
datapack.description: Tokens of quality time that may be minted by players with high Harmony.

datapack.title: Favors
datapack.description: Limited-time, server-wide benefits or special events that players can activate by spending a Charm.

datapack.title: Harmonized Chorus Fruit
datapack.description: A special Chorus Fruit made with a Charm that allows players to teleport to each other.

datapack.title: Endchanting
datapack.description: Enchantments one level beyond the vanilla maximum (for instance, Sharpness VI) are bestowed to players' equipped items when defeating the Ender Dragon.

datapack.title: Empowered Ender Dragon
datapack.description: The Ender Dragon is capable of summoning mobs, lightning, etc.

datapack.title: Extra Experience
datapack.description: Certain activities grant experience, such as looting chests, taming mobs, or curing Zombie Villagers.

datapack.title: Haberdasher
datapack.description: Players can put arbitrary items in their head slot or create player heads at the World Hall.

datapack.title: The Porcelain
datapack.description: A custom dimension where players can freely use Creative mode.
